string.text: Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Hay un contacto que está dispuesto a pagar bien por nuestros servicios. Ve a verlo
Buena suerte, stalker.
Incursión de comando
Debes infiltrarte sigilosamente en un campamento enemigo.

Tengo un trabajo para ti. Una cierta facción se ha mudado a un área que nuestro cliente preferiría que no existiera y que necesite ser eliminada. Debes ir solo. Están preparados para un gran asalto, pero no esperan un infiltrado solitario. Métete en su campamento y elimina tantos como puedas.
Bien hecho. Nuestro cliente está satisfecho. Incluso pateó una bonificación por ti.
Asalto al campamento bandido
Dirige un escuadrón de mercenarios en una incursión en un campamento de bandidos en el área.
Los bandidos se han mudado al área. Toma algunos hombres y desaloja.
Excelente trabajo. Eres un buen guerrero.
Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Tengo un cliente para ti. I've marked his location on your map.
Buena suerte, stalker.
Incursión de emboscada
Enlace con algunos Mercs a punto de emboscar a un campamento enemigo en el área.
Oye, algunos de los chicos han descubierto un campamento enemigo en la Zona y se dirigen a emboscarlos. Si te das prisa, probablemente puedas alcanzarlos.
Gran trabajo. Here's your cut.
Rescatar un prisionero mercenario
Un Merc ha sido tomado prisionero por los militares. Sácalo.
¡Esas perras del ejército han capturado a uno de nuestros hombres! Entra y sácalo.
Buen trabajo. Ningún hombre dejado atrás.
%s para Hog
Mata al mutante que atacó a Hog y dale su %s.
You're out in the field a lot. Si te encuentras con un cierto mutante, quiero que lo mates.

La semana pasada fui atacado por un mutante. Bastardo casi me termina, pero luego desapareció antes de que pudiera arruinarle el culo. It got me good, I'm gonna have this scar the rest of my life. Si ves la maldita cosa, mátala, destrúyela, tráeme su maldito %s. Te recompensaré bien a cambio. ¡Lo mataste! ¡Estupendo!
You killed it! Great! Take that you little fuck! Thanks man, you've done well.
Becoming a Mercenary
Dushman wants 12,000 RU as contract collateral in return for officially signing you on as a Mercenary.

That'll be 12,000 RU - because we can't really do our normal background checks while in the Zone, consider it a pledged asset in case you later choose to opt out of your contract with us. Professionalism and preparedness are what we're all about around here. Bring your own weapons, no spitting on the floor. Sound good?
Good to see you pulled through after all. Consider your contract with us signed and validated, Merc.
Contrato de asesino
Usted ha sido contratado para encontrar y eliminar un objetivo. Devolver para el pago cuando la tarea esté completa.

Nuestro contratista tiene una lista de recompensas sobresalientes. Necesitamos voluntarios para llevar a cabo estos éxitos discretamente, lo que nos permitirá cumplir con nuestras obligaciones para con nuestro contratista. ¿Estás interesado?
¿Se hace? Estupendo. Here's your percentage.
Assault territory
Despeje el área de cualquier y todas las amenazas hostiles.
I need you to be the point man on an assault. Despeja el área objetivo de todas y cada una de las fuerzas hostiles.
Excelente trabajo. Eres un buen guerrero.
Capturar documentos enemigos
Capture los documentos enemigos y devuélvalos a Dushman.
Nuestro empleador nos ha notificado un documento que necesita que capturemos del enemigo. Tráelo aquí y te entregaré tu pago.
Buen trabajo.
Encuentra %s
%s are required by Hog to install basic equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
Tengo una propuesta para ti. Si puede traerme algunas herramientas nuevas, recibirá un pago. ¿Estás preparado para eso?

There is. I've been looking all over for a set of %s. It should contain some oil and tools I need to do work on firearms. I'll pay you for one of those toolkits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Brilliant! This is what I've been looking for. ¡Gracias!
Encuentra %s
% Hog son requeridos por Hog para instalar actualizaciones avanzadas de equipos, debe traerlos de vuelta a él si encuentra alguno.
Tengo otra proposición. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of those, but if you can find one, I need it.
It's got everything I need. Gracias.
Encuentra %s
%s are required by Hog to install expert equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
Tengo otra proposición. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of those, but if you can find one, I need it.
It's got everything I need. Gracias.
Eliminate the target
It's necessary to eliminate another target
Yes, we always have work. I'll give you the coordinates, you kill the target.
Well done, here's your money.
Consigue %s
Aslan has asked me to collect %s.
Feel like hunting a few people? I'll tell you how many patches you have to strip, you bring them to me and get a reward.
Feel like hunting a few people? Bring me %s and you'll be handsomely rewarded.
Bien hecho. Here's your money.
Monster Hunter
There is demand for a %s.
Yes, I've always got some work for you. A wealthy client's interested in a rare mutant part. Bring me to it and I'll make it worth the effort.
Yes, I've always got some work for you. A wealthy client's interested in a rare mutant part. Bring me to it and I'll make it worth the effort. Bring me %s.
¡Bien hecho! Aquí está tu recompensa.
Night Terror
Aslan wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which haunts the Red Forest.

Listen. There've been rumours that a particularly nasty specimen of chimera haunts the Red Forest. Not even whole teams of stalkers are safe. And they say the chimera's pitch black. That just might be the fucker who slaughtered one of our recon teams. So, I want it really, really dead, all right? Gear up and tear it a new asshole.
Excellent job, stalker. Well, here's your reward, you deserve it.
Secure the base
Aslan asked you to clear all the mutants in the area near the base.

Not a contract but a personal favour, rewarded of course. There's too many mutants roaming around, at night they make too much noise and don't let me sleep well, during day they may attract stalker hunters and I don't like outsiders snooping around here. Go sweep the area.
Here's the payment, keep up the good work.
Encuentra %s
%s is required by Surgeon to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily bias is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
¡Gran trabajo! Eres mío a lo grande.
